title: FDIC Launches Plan on Bank Applications to Issue Stablecoins
description: The Federal Deposit Insurance Corp. moved to propose a framework that outlines how banks would be able to apply to issue payment stablecoins via a subsidiary, a key first step from the agency towards implementing landmark legislation.
content: The Federal Deposit Insurance Corp. moved to propose a framework that outlines how banks would be able to apply to issue payment stablecoins via a subsidiary, a key first step from the agency towards implementing landmark legislation.
